ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: KOS?
ygData.msgSnippet: What is there to hunt in Lavastorm? I have a lvl 15 DE Wizard. Anything good for her to hunt? luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
What is there to hunt in Lavastorm?
I have a lvl 15 DE Wizard. Anything good for her to hunt?
luv,
-Su

> I haven't made that run yet. I plan to sow and camo, then run the
> road. Since the bridge is the safest way to cross the water, I will
> use that. Alternately, sow, levitate, then camo. Might be able to lev
> over the water along the left wall.
>
> I figured it must be a not particularly safe place when I found
> groups resting just outside the zone. They seemed to be hunting just
> inside, then zoning to med and rest.
>
> Per advice here, I am thinking on working on Lavastorm for some
> leveling in the second half of my teens.
>
> Barto of Rivervale, lvl 14 halfling druid.
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., "Legleiter" <RETIELGEL@p...> wrote:
> > Will a Halfling Druid be KOS in Nektulos Forest?
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>

>
